content: And again, going back to my past on how do you focus on areas with very high medical -- unmet medical needs, find very good assets and connect those and accelerate, I think is the best place for us to be going from first in class, and that's maybe building on your comment here, first-in-class targets to trying to see what are the best-in-class targets and move from that point rather than from first-in-class and take a really high-risk strategy as well as combining that with medical needs, should accelerate time to market significantly.
